mapper.select: SELECT c.real_name,b.identity,c.phone,b.identity_card, a.community_name,CONCAT(a.building_name,a.units,'单元',a.house_number)as houseName, c.username,c.birthday,c.nation,c.marriage,c.account_type, c.address,c.gender,c.domicile_location,c.party,c.rental_type, c.stay_card,b.e_contacts FROM t_house a,t_owner b,t_user c WHERE b.id=#{id} AND b.user_id=c.id and b.house_id=a.id
